channel.title: Posts on Frontend Talk Demo - Garance
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Frontend Talk Demo - Garance

item.title: Frontend demo post
item.description: What’s that ? This post is an example for our frontend talk. We selected a theme from Hugo’s library, and this is determining all the styling you see. It was written entirely in Markdown, and we can use all the usual formatting we know. What are men to rocks and mountains? – Jane Austen
